languages.text: {n}В глазах Ирлиэт мелькает неподдельный ужас — но лишь на миг, после чего обезглавленное тело оседает в грязь. Именно такой вы ее и запомните — жалкой и испуганной перед лицом судьбы, что для нее страшнее смерти. Сломленной именно вами.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Ирлиэт мелькает неподдельный ужас — но лишь на миг, после чего обезглавленное тело оседает в грязь. Именно такой вы ее и запомните — жалкой и испуганной перед лицом судьбы, что для нее страшнее смерти. Сломленной именно вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear for a moment — then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you are going to remember her — facing her death scared and miserable, a disgrace worse than death. Broken by you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear for a moment — then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you are going to remember her — facing her death scared and miserable, a disgrace worse than death. Broken by you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear for a moment — then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you are going to remember her — facing her death scared and miserable, a disgrace worse than death. Broken by you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear for a moment — then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you are going to remember her — facing her death scared and miserable, a disgrace worse than death. Broken by you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un destello de terror sincero cruza fugazmente los ojos de Yrliet... y acto seguido su cuerpo decapitado se desploma sobre el fango. Así es como la recordarás: patética y aterrada ante un destino peor que la muerte para ella. Quebrantada al fin... por ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un destello de terror asoma momentáneamente a los ojos de Yrliet; luego su cuerpo decapitado se desploma sobre el fango. Así es como la recordarás: enfrentándose a su final con expresión asustada y patética, una deshonra aún peor que la muerte. Vencida en cuerpo y espíritu por tu mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特眼中闪过了纯粹的恐惧……随后，她的无头尸体就倒在了泥坑里。这就是你铭记她的方式，亲手为她带来了痛苦、恐怖的命运，彻底摧毁了她的灵魂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特眼中闪过了纯粹的恐惧，下一刻，她的无头尸体就倒在了泥坑里。这就是你铭记她的方式，让她在痛苦与恐惧中死去。这样的命运比死亡更加可怕，由你亲手铸成。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, les yeux d'Yrliet s'écarquillent de terreur... puis son corps décapité s'effondre dans la boue. C'est le dernier souvenir que vous garderez d'elle : effrayée et misérable dans ses ultimes instants, brisée de vos mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, la terreur se lit dans les yeux d'Yrliet, puis son corps sans tête s'effondre dans la boue. C'est le souvenir que vous garderez d'elle : effrayée et misérable dans ses derniers instants, brisée de vos mains. Un déshonneur pire que la mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの目が一瞬、本物の恐怖で輝き、それから首のない体が泥の中に倒れこむ。それがあなたの記憶する彼女の姿だ…怯え、惨めな死に直面し、死よりもひどい恥辱を受ける。あなたによって壊されたその姿が。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの目が一瞬、本物の恐怖で輝き、それから首のない体が泥の中に倒れこむ。それがあなたの記憶する彼女の姿だ…怯え、惨めな死に直面し、死よりもひどい恥辱を受ける。あなたによって壊されたその姿が。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In Yrliets Augen blitzt echte Angst auf ... dann fällt ihre kopflose Leiche in den Schlamm. So wirst du dich an sie erinnern: Erbärmlich und voll panischer Angst vor einem Schicksal, das für sie schlimmer ist als der Tod. Endlich gebrochen — von dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kurz blitzt in Yrliets Augen echte Angst auf ... dann fällt ihre kopflose Leiche in den Schlamm. So wirst du dich an sie erinnern, verängstigt und elend im Angesicht des Todes, eine schlimmere Schande als der Tod selbst. Von dir gebrochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in gözleri, hakiki bir korkuyla parlıyor... Ardından başsız bedeni, balçığın içine yığılıp kalıyor. Onu hep böyle hatırlayacaksın. Acınası bir hâlde, kendi gözünde ölümden bile beter bir kadere karşı korku içinde... En nihayetinde yıkılmış, hem de senin ellerinde...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes flash with genuine fear... and then her headless body slumps into the mud. That is how you will remember her: pathetic and terrified of a fate that, for her, is worse than death. Finally broken — by you.{/n}
